title: [Large-scale] TAGL-Based Cognitive Load Management Strategy for Chemistry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry concepts (atoms, molecules, chemical formulas)
context.additional_context: Foundational chemistry competency enhancement program for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Requires accessible learning environments via smartphone-based platforms

learning_goals: Learners can calculate quantitative relationships in chemical reactions (stoichiometry) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can effectively chunk learning materials according to cognitive load theory principles and autonomously develop self-directed study plans
Learners can achieve equivalent proficiency to advanced knowledge holders using the TAGL tool

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
